Sentencas: The progress in the diffusion of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) as commercial devices is not paired by literature production.
Titulo: In-situ experimental benchmarking of solid oxide fuel cell metal interconnect solutions

Sentencas: Articles describing the behaviour of SOFC stacks are rare because of confidentiality reasons for commercial suppliers while research centres prefer to focus on single components or low technology readiness level research.
Titulo: In-situ experimental benchmarking of solid oxide fuel cell metal interconnect solutions

Sentencas: This article aim to fill this gap presenting the analysis of three short stacks run in operative conditions for 10 000 h each.
Titulo: In-situ experimental benchmarking of solid oxide fuel cell metal interconnect solutions

Sentencas: The stacks are characterized through voltage vs time curves, electron microscopy, and electro-chemical impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: In-situ experimental benchmarking of solid oxide fuel cell metal interconnect solutions

Sentencas: Focus is given on the interconnect; notably on the different types of coatings, varying for composition (MnCo2O4, MnCo1.8Fe0.2O4) and deposition technique (atmospheric plasma spray-APS, physical vapour deposition-PVD, wet powder spraying-WPS).
Titulo: In-situ experimental benchmarking of solid oxide fuel cell metal interconnect solutions

Sentencas: Nitriding of the steel substrate as a solution to improve the chromium retention properties is tested as well.
Titulo: In-situ experimental benchmarking of solid oxide fuel cell metal interconnect solutions

Sentencas: Results: indicate that coating deposition technique is the most important parameter, with single repeat unit (SRU) containing PVD coating showing the lowest voltage degradation rate.
Titulo: In-situ experimental benchmarking of solid oxide fuel cell metal interconnect solutions

Sentencas: Commercial ferritic stainless steel K41 confirmed to be a reliable choice if coupled with a coating.
Titulo: In-situ experimental benchmarking of solid oxide fuel cell metal interconnect solutions

Sentencas: Moreover, SRU containing WPS coating demonstrated to be more reliable than expected from standard area specific resistance 4-probe test.
Titulo: In-situ experimental benchmarking of solid oxide fuel cell metal interconnect solutions
